entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
